channel.title: Trisity 24/7 (Need staff) Drop party soon!
channel.description:
[b]Forum-[/b] http://trisitypk.x10.mx/smf/index.php
[b]Webclient-[/b] http://trisitypk.x10.mx/webclient.html
[b]TrisityPK[/b] We stand for quality, we have and always will. We are hosted on a strong dedicated server to ensure that we are online 99% of the time. TrisityPK has been under development for over 6 months, but has only gone online a few weeks ago and we have already reached 650+ players on. The developers work of trisitypk work around the clock and there are regular updates and events.
[b]Server features[/b] We would like to globally name a few of our many attractions, if we were to name them all, the list would be too long! In short: -Active Pking all around the server - More that 25 unique bosses - Advanced Pk point system, more killstreak-> the more points - Castle Wars (soon) - Double Xp weekends - Dwarf multicannon - Tons of different training areas - Duel arena - Staking - Fun Pk (dieing and you wont lose anything!) - Revenants pking - Active Staff & Community - Professional SMF forums - Vote4Reward (soon) - Donation store on website (soon) - Dungeoneering with multiple floors! - Summoning with all familiars - More than 1600 npc's spawned! - Ability to switch reset combat skills - Social slayer and multiple slayer masters - Full pest control - Hunter
[b]Client features[/b] - Ability to choose between x10 and x1 hitmarks - Ability to choose between new hitmarks (with combat style icon) or old hitmarks - Fullscreen - Ability to choose between 6 game frames
[b]Hosting[/b] - Cache server - Download cloud instance - Website hosting cloud instance - Sql server - Forum VPs - Gameserver (dedi): 2 HyperThreaded Intel Xeon Processors with 8 cores each running on 2.9GHZ (16 cores total) 12GB DDR3 RAM 2GBPS network switch 3x 50GB SSD harddrives Heavy software and hardware DDoS prote

item.title: Trisity 24/7 (Need staff) Drop party soon!
item.dc:creator: @hetland20 hetland20
item.description:
@hetland20 wrote:

Forum- http://trisitypk.x10.mx/smf/index.php

Webclient- http://trisitypk.x10.mx/webclient.html

TrisityPK
We stand for quality, we have and always will. We are hosted on a strong dedicated server to ensure that we are online 99% of the time. TrisityPK has been under development for over 6 months, but has only gone online a few weeks ago and we have already reached 650+ players on.
The developers work of trisitypk work around the clock and there are regular updates and events.

Server features
We would like to globally name a few of our many attractions, if we were to name them all, the list would be too long! In short:
-Active Pking all around the server

  • More that 25 unique bosses
  • Advanced Pk point system, more killstreak-> the more points
  • Castle Wars (soon)
  • Double Xp weekends
  • Dwarf multicannon
  • Tons of different training areas
  • Duel arena - Staking
  • Fun Pk (dieing and you wont lose anything!)
  • Revenants pking
  • Active Staff & Community
  • Professional SMF forums
  • Vote4Reward (soon)
  • Donation store on website (soon)
  • Dungeoneering with multiple floors!
  • Summoning with all familiars
  • More than 1600 npcâ€™s spawned!
  • Ability to switch reset combat skills
  • Social slayer and multiple slayer masters
  • Full pest control
  • Hunter

Client features

  • Ability to choose between x10 and x1 hitmarks
  • Ability to choose between new hitmarks (with combat style icon) or old hitmarks
  • Fullscreen
  • Ability to choose between 6 game frames

Hosting

  • Cache server
  • Download cloud instance
  • Website hosting cloud instance
  • Sql server
  • Forum VPs
  • Gameserver (dedi):
    2 HyperThreaded Intel Xeon Processors with 8 cores each running on 2.9GHZ (16 cores total)
    12GB DDR3 RAM
    2GBPS network switch
    3x 50GB SSD harddrives
    Heavy software and hardware DDoS prote
